oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Traffic lines and buildings around the Davidson County Court House, Nashville, Tennessee, 1970 December
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A view of the traffic lines and some of the businesses around the Davidson County Court House in downtown Nashville, Tennessee, circa December 1970. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 b & w filmstrip negative
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Davidson County Court House (Nashville, Tenn.); Everett Beasley, Inc. (Nashville, Tenn.); Neely-Harwell and Company (Nashville, Tenn.)
